tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_editorial_content (
    editorial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_name VARCHAR(50),
    article_title VARCHAR(100),
    publish_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EditorialContent (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publish_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrity (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  occupation VARCHAR(100),
  birthdate DATE,
  nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
	id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	occupation VARCHAR(255),
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	age INT
);

CREATE TABLE Editorials (
	id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	author VARCHAR(255),
	date_published DATE,
	content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  occupation VARCHAR(255),
  nationality VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Images (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  caption TEXT,
  photographer VARCHAR(255),
  article_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Categories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ArticleTags (
  article_id INT NOT NULL,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (article_id, tag_name)
)
